channel.title: [HELP]no poeple can login to my server exept of at my house[HELP]
channel.description:
Hey, i got a server, i portforwarded etc.
but only i can login...
at other houses, they get it is off :S
can someone maybee help???
tell me if you need more info

item.title: [HELP]no poeple can login to my server exept of at my house[HELP]
item.dc:creator: @tekstyled555 tekstyled555
item.description:
@tekstyled555 wrote:

sometimes ur anti virus blocks pll so yeah make sure u have enabled that pll can join ur server i use AVG 8.5 its perfect 4 private servers

cause my router is dutch cause i am dutch

EDIT just found a TUT for spead touch my router is saw just 1 thing different, i just asked if it does matter something, if zo, i think my server is saved :D[/quote]and i got speedtouch to add me on msn: Jarnodag@hotmail.com i got problems to…
